sidebar.title: In case of doubt
sidebar.para: In case you are in any kind of difficult or are uncertain take picture or record video and ask your questions on the #reprap IRC channel.

section.title: Printing spare parts
section.para: After your printer is working properly the first things you should print are spare pulleys and spare rod clamps. These parts are known to break. When they do break you want to have spares.
